Packflow
  • Documentation
  • View page source

DocumentationÔÉÅ

packflow is a software development kit (SDK) that simplifies the development process and standardizes packaging of AI/ML running on streaming or event-based data sources.

By leveraging Packflow, teams can capitalize on numerous optimizations and utilities that are included out-of-the-box, significantly reducing the time and effort required to onboard new capabilities. This makes Packflow an attractive solution for organizations seeking to efficiently harness the power of their streaming data without getting bogged down in unnecessary complexity and redundant code.

Visit the About Packflow page for more information, or proceed to Getting Started to quickly install Packflow and build an Inference Backend.
